recipes.title: Best Ever Juicy Burger + Albertsons-Safeway and Best Foods Sweepstakes

winePairing.pairingText: Burger works really well with Malbec, Merlot, and Zinfandel. Merlot will be perfectly adequate for a classic burger with standard toppings. Bolder toppings call for bolder wines, such as a malbec or peppery zinfandel. You could try Terrazas de los Andes Reserva Malbec. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.2 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 22 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Terrazas de los Andes Reserva Malbec
productMatches.description: Bright red color with purple shades. Intense floral and fruity notes. Presence of violets, ripe black cherry and plum aromas. ReIts sweet and juicy mouthfeel delivers finesse, delicate tannins and an elegant finish of black fruits. veals a toasty and spicy character of black pepper and chocolate.Pair with Tuna Carpaccio and Red Fruits Vinaigrette, Tenderloin served with MediterraneanRatatouille and Moist Semisweet Chocolate Cake over Mascarpone and Red Fruits Ice Cream.
